tpl.sql: SELECT A.CUID, A.LABEL_CN, A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM FIBER_CAB_GX WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT UNION ALL SELECT LABEL_CN FROM FIBER_DP_GX WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT) AS N_RELATED_ACCESS_POINT, A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM NMS_SYSTEM T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_EMS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_EMS_CUID, A.RELATED_EMS_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = trim(A.RELATED_POS_CUID)) AS N_RELATED_POS_CUID, A.RELATED_POS_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM PTP WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID, A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID, (SELECT F.PRODUCT_MODEL FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE F WHERE F.SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND F.CUID = A.MODEL) AS N_MODEL, A.MODEL, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID) AS N_RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, A.FTTX, A.ONU_TYPE, A.OWNERSHIP, A.OWNERSHIP_MAN, (SELECT count(a.cuid) PORT_NUMBER FROM PTP Pt WHERE Pt.RELATED_NE_CUID = A.CUID AND ( Pt.PORT_SUB_TYPE = 15 or Pt.PORT_SUB_TYPE = 29 or Pt.PORT_SUB_TYPE = 37 ) ) PORT_NUMBER, A.MAINT_PERSON, A.DATA_QUALITY_PERSON, A.PRESERVER, A.MAINT_MODE, A.DEV_IP, A.LIVE_CYCLE, A.SOFT_VERSION, A.ACCESS_TYPE, A.ONU_ID, A.AUTH_TYPE, decode(A.AUTH_TYPE,1,SEQNO,2,MAC_ADDR,3,PASSWORD,4,LOGICID) as SEQNO_A, A.PASSWORD, A.LOGICID, A.MAC_ADDR, A.SEQNO, TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') AS CREATE_TIME, A.RELATED_PROJECT_CUID FROM $ns$AN_ONU A WHERE A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID LIKE '{USERDISTRICT}%'

SELECT T.CUID, T.LABEL_CN, (select label_cn from district where cuid = T.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID and rownum=1) N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, T.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, T.RATION, (select label_cn from fiber_cab_gx where cuid = T.RELATED_CAB_CUID union all select label_cn from fiber_dp_gx where cuid = t.related_cab_cuid and rownum=1) as N_RELATED_CAB_CUID, T.RELATED_CAB_CUID, (select label_cn from trans_element where cuid = T.RELATED_UPNE_CUID union all select label_cn from an_pos where cuid = t.RELATED_UPNE_CUID and rownum=1) as N_RELATED_UPNE_CUID, T.RELATED_UPNE_CUID, (select label_cn from ptp where cuid = T.RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID and rownum=1) as N_RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID, T.RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID, (select label_cn from ptp where cuid = T.RELATED_PORT2_CUID and rownum=1) as N_RELATED_PORT2_CUID, T.RELATED_PORT2_CUID, (select label_cn from device_vendor where cuid = T.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID and rownum=1) as N_RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, T.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, T.OWNERSHIP, T.OWNERSHIP_MAN, T.MAINT_PERSON, T.DATA_QUALITY_PERSON, T.LIVE_CYCLE, RELATED_OLT_CUID, T.ACCESS_TYPE, T.CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER, to_char(T.SETUP_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') as SETUP_TIME, T.PRESERVER, T.MAINT_MODE, to_char(T.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') AS CREATE_TIME, T.SEQNO, T.RELATED_PROJECT_CUID FROM $ns$AN_POS T WHERE T.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID LIKE '{userDistrict}%'

SELECT 'PTP' AS BM_CLASS_ID, P.CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM AN_ONU WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_NE_CUID, P.RELATED_NE_CUID, (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = AO.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM AN_ONU AO WHERE AO.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, (SELECT C.LABEL_CN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CARD_CUID, P.RELATED_CARD_CUID, (SELECT C.FDN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_FDN, (select C.CARDTYPE_NAME FROM CARD_KIND C, CARD D WHERE D.MODEL = C.CUID AND D.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_CARD_KIND_CUID, P.LABEL_CN, P.PORT_STATE, P.PORT_SUB_TYPE, P.PORT_NO, DECODE(PORT_SUB_TYPE,'16','26','34') PORT_RATE, P.PORT_TYPE, P.VLAN, (SELECT AO.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM AN_ONU AO WHERE AO.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, P.REMARK, ao.related_project_cuid FROM $ns$PTP P , $ns$AN_ONU AO WHERE P.DEV_TYPE = 2 AND AO.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID LIKE '{userDistrict}%' AND AO.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID

SELECT 'PTP' AS BM_CLASS_ID, P.CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_NE_CUID, P.RELATED_NE_CUID, (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = AP.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM AN_POS AP WHERE AP.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, (SELECT C.LABEL_CN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CARD_CUID, P.RELATED_CARD_CUID, (SELECT C.FDN FROM CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_FDN, (select C.CARDTYPE_NAME FROM CARD_KIND C, CARD D WHERE D.MODEL = C.CUID AND D.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_CARD_KIND_CUID, P.LABEL_CN, P.PORT_STATE, P.PORT_SUB_TYPE, P.PORT_NO, '35' PORT_RATE, P.PORT_TYPE, P.VLAN, (SELECT AP.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM AN_POS AP WHERE AP.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, P.REMARK, ap.related_project_cuid FROM $ns$PTP P, $ns$AN_POS AP WHERE P.DEV_TYPE = 3 AND AP.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID LIKE '{userDistrict}%' AND AP.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID
